837450.name: Heaven Will Be Mine Soundtrack
837450.description:
The soundtrack to 'HEAVEN WILL BE MINE' finds you descending into the immense tidal gravity well of deep space. All encompassing heartbreak and war in the form of heart-rending synthesizer pads and tear-stained electronic drum programming. Total sub bass atrophy in the heart of a long-gone lover. The unique offer to suffer prolonged exposure to the head-down hypnotic punishment of a dying galaxy. Like being vaporized in a solid beam of light. Like weeping out a blastwave.

Step into the Ship-Self and begin your acclimatization...
This is 'HEAVEN WILL BE MINE.'
